MAIN.HEAD: Simplicity of health tracking
MAIN.SUBHEAD: Apps to make daily tasks agile and effortless
MAIN.IMG: Apple Watch wellness and health apps

P1.HEAD: Electrolyte
P1.TEXT: Electrolytes play a vital role in maintaining homeostasis in the body. They help to regulate the heart and neurological function, fluid balance, oxygen delivery, acid-base balance, and much more.
P1.IMG: Record electrolytes and minerals with you Apple Watch

P2.HEAD: Log Mass
P2.TEXT: Tracking your weight boosts your efficiency in terms of your time and workouts. Not only will it push you to do better, but will also drive you to be your own competition!
P2.IMG: Save body mass directly from your Apple Watch into Apple Health Storage

P3.HEAD: Log Vitamin
P3.TEXT: Tracking your essential vitamins has so many benefits, from helping to manage food intolerances to increasing energy, avoiding changes in mood, and fueling the rhythms of your day.
P3.IMG: Track the most esential vitamins directly on your wrist

P4.HEAD: Log Waist
P4.TEXT: Waist circumference is a measurement taken around the abdomen at the level of the umbilicus (belly button).
P4.IMG: Keep track of your waist size directly from you arm

P1.DESC1: We have a responsibility to ourselves for our health.  No one can make us lose weight or choose healthy foods.  We must decide this for ourselves.
P1.DESC2: Request reviews and get recognized for the job done well, promote yourself, build your brand.
P1.DESC3_2: 60% have stated that timely communication during the application process makes a positive impact on their mind.
P1.DESC3_3: 80% say that a single negative experience can change their decision even at the last minute.
P1.DESC3_4: 94% would like to receive interview feedback, but only 41% have received it in the past.

P2.DESC1: We have a responsibility to ourselves for our health.  No one can make us lose weight or choose healthy foods.  We must decide this for ourselves.
P2.DESC2: Logging our weight makes it real. While that sound strange; it’s real. This is data, recorded facts. They are real whether we record them or not.
P2.DESC3: Logging daily is important, it keeps healthy habits in front of our minds.  Every time we make a log entry, we are reminded of our commitment to health. Skipping a day here and there makes it easier to skip 2 days, then 3 days. Then, before you know it, you’ve stopped and you are back to your old habits.
P2.DESC4_2: History of past recordings with percentage difference
P2.DESC4_3: All watch sizes, all watch face complication types
P2.DESC4_4: Does not need companion iPhone app

ERROR.INVALID_ENDPOINT: Looks like something broke on our side. Sorry for inconvenience.
ERROR.LOGIN_REQUIRED: This operation requires authorization. Please login and try again.
ERROR.RECRUITER_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, we are unable to locate recruiter's profile.
ERROR.RECRUITER_NAME: Please check this recruite name, looks like there might be an error there
ERROR.REVIEW_LENGTH: Review is too long. Please make it less than 1000 charachers.
ERROR.RATE_YOURSELF: You cannot rate your own profile
ERROR.EMAIL_NOT_CONFIRMED: Action is forbidden. Please confirm your email first.
ERROR.ACCOUNT_OWNERSHIP: It is forbidden to update an account you do not own
ERROR.SECURITY_CODE: Invalid security code. Please make sure you enter all digits correctly. If problem continues please request a new code.
ERROR.SECURITY_CODE_EXPIRED: This security code has expired, please request a new code.
ERROR.REQUIRED_OWNER_NAME_VISIBILITY: Should your review be published as Anonymous?
ERROR.REQUIRED_KNOW_COMPANY: Please enter recruiter's knowledge of the company
ERROR.REQUIRED_KNOW_SPECIALITY: Please enter recruiter's knowledge of your specialty
ERROR.REQUIRED_GOT_HIRED: Did you get aa offer? If so, how long did it take?
ERROR.REQUIRED_KNOW_PROFILE: How well recruiter knows your profile?
ERROR.REQUIRED_GOT_INTERVIEW: Did you get an interview? If so, how long did it take?
ERROR.AGENCY_NAME: Please enter agency name. If you do not know one select Unknown Agency from the list.
ERROR.INVALID_AGENCY_ID: Loks like we have some trouples finding this agency. Please refresh page and try to select that agency again.

ERROR.500_TEXT: Sorry, something went wrong on our end. If this problem persists please contact us from the Home page or via email at support@recruiter.reviews
ERROR.404_TEXT: Some of our pages, such as password restore or email confirmation, only have short lifespan. Please visit the Home page of our site.
